channel.title: Dubsar News Feed
channel.description: Keep up with changes to the Dubsar Dictionary Project site.

item.title: Dubsar 1.2.2 for iOS available in the App Store
item.description: This version fixes some small bugs on the iPad related to the word of the day, improves support for the iPad Retina and abolishes application icon bagdes.

item.title: Dubsar server upgrade complete
item.description: The Dubsar server has undergone a number of upgrades, from the operating system up. In particular, it is now running Ubuntu 12.04 as well as Ruby 2.0, Rails 4 and Passenger 4. Apologies for any inconvenience caused by the outage.

item.title: Dubsar server unavailable over the weekend
item.description: The server will be unavailable for a few hours between 00:00 UTC Saturday, August 10 and Sunday, August 11, 2013. (On the west coast of the U.S., for example, that's 5:00 p.m. Friday and 5:00 p.m. Saturday.) The server is undergoing some important upgrades and has to be taken down for a while. This will result in an outage for Android clients and iOS clients before 1.1.0, if any is still installed. Any iOS app of version 1.1.0 or later (1.1.0 was released in 2011; tap the About button on the Home view to see which version you have) will function normally, since the app has a local database, but the word of the day may be affected. Users of version 1.2.0 or higher of Dubsar for iOS should see no effect at all. The server will be back up well before 00:00 UTC Sunday, August 11, 2013.

item.title: Dubsar supports Fight for the Future's petition and protest against Internet spying.
item.description: Visit the site to sign the petition.

item.title: Dubsar 1.2.1 for iOS available in the App Store
item.description: This release fixes an iPad crash.

item.title: Dubsar 1.2.0 for iOS available in the App Store
item.description: This release includes the same database clean-up that was performed on the server as well as an optional push notification for the Word of the Day.

item.title: Dubsar converted to HTTPS
item.description: The old HTTP URLS redirect to the new ones. No action should be necessary.

item.title: Dubsar 1.1.1 available in the iOS App Store
item.description: This release provides some fixes for iOS 6 and iPhone 5.

item.title: Word of the Day Fixed
item.description: The word of the day was stuck for quite a long time. It has been fixed. It will begin updating again on Android devices at 00:00 UTC on January 3.

item.title: Dubsar in the Amazon App Store
item.description: Version 1.0.2 of Dubsar for Android is now available for free in the Amazon App Store.

item.title: Version 1.0.2 of Dubsar for Android
item.description: This release fixes a couple of bugs and is now available for free worldwide in the Android Market.

item.title: Happy Halloween
item.description: Happy Halloween from the Dubsar Dictionary Project. In honor of the occasion, the Dubsar dark theme is free all day.

item.title: Version 1.1.0 of Dubsar for iOS
item.description: Version 1.1.0 of Dubsar for iOS is available for free worldwide in the iTunes App Store. This version introduces a local SQLite database, so the app works nearly as well on an airplane as in an office. Only the Word of the Day and the FAQ are taken from the network.

item.title: Full text searching in Dubsar
item.description: Dubsar now supports full text searching, like most search engines. See the FAQ for more information.

item.title: Dubsar for iOS 1.0.1
item.description: Dubsar for iOS 1.0.1 introduces support for iOS 4.2 as well as some minor fixes and usability improvements.

item.title: Dubsar for Android 1.0.1
item.description: Dubsar for Android 1.0.1 fixes a 4G network bug.

item.title: Dubsar for Android Released
item.description: Dubsar is now available worldwide for free in the Android Market.

item.title: Dubsar for iOS Released
item.description: Dubsar apps for iPhone, iPod Touch and iPad are now available for free from the App Store worldwide.

item.title: Word of the day
item.description: Dubsar now has a word of the day on its index page.

item.title: Recent changes to Dubsar
item.description: The main Dubsar site has much-improved navigation among words, synsets and senses, including individual views of each of those things (as opposed to simply displaying search results). The search field has undergone some improvements. Some of the mobile views have been spruced up. Dubsar now offers a rudimentary JSON web service, in preparation for iPhone and Android apps. And Dubsar now includes a custom share dialog. Click on the "share" link at the top of the page to display a dialog with a number of sharing options. Through an AJAX implementation, Dubsar does not include any markup or content from sites like Facebook, Google and Twitter until the share link is clicked. This speeds page loads and avoids sending browsing history to Facebook or Google except when you're ready to share. Tell the world!

item.title: New Dubsar Mobile Address
item.description: Dubsar Mobile now has its own domain and is deployed at http://m.dubsar-dictionary.com/m. The old address still forwards.

item.title: Dubsar Mobile Applications
item.description: With the arrival of the Dubsar Mobile Edition, it has become clear that Dubsar will not be fully available on mobile platforms until it includes applications for iPhone and Android. Look for these rather soon, in the summer of 2011.

item.title: Dubsar Mobile Edition
item.description: The long-promised Dubsar Mobile Edition has finally arrived.

item.title: Changes to Dubsar
item.description: Dubsar is undergoing a number of changes over the next few weeks, some visible, some not. The site may not be as reliable as usual. If it seems to be down, don't fret. It will be back up soon.

item.title: Austin Guardian Fairies
item.description: Dubsar is temporarily hosting the Austin Guardian Fairies online.

item.title: Happy New Year
item.description: Dubsar is open New Year's Day!

item.title: Thirty Days of Dubsar
item.description: No, it's not a Kurosawa film. In its first thirty days, Dubsar carried on a brief, ill-fated flirtation with social networks that collapsed in a heap of JavaScript and tracking cookies. Having washed them out of its hair, Dubsar has undergone a number of upgrades and performance improvements and gained some new features, like OpenSearch support so that you can add it to your browser's list of search engines and search Dubsar, complete with live suggestions, right from your browser's search box. This is Release 1.0.3 of Dubsar. Look for further improvements in 2011, notably a mobile edition. Happy Holidays!

item.title: No more Social widgets on Dubsar
item.description: The Facebook "Like" button and box left a tracking cookie behind, allowing Facebook to know whenever you visited Dubsar. They have been removed. Please visit Dubsar on Facebook, but Dubsar will not use Facebook's widgets again until they are free of tracking cookies. While Facebook was the worst offender, sending a cookie even if you were not logged in, most of the other networks were also notified whenever you visited the site. Only Delicious provides a cookie-free image, so it remains.

item.title: Dubsar is a Search Engine
item.description: Dubsar now supports the OpenSearch protocol and can be added to your browser's list of search engines.

item.title: Dubsar no longer on Coral
item.description: Dubsar's performance on the Coral CDN was terrible. The experiment has been abandoned.

item.title: Dubsar subscribed links on Google
item.description: Dubsar now offers subscribed links on Google, so you can add selected Dubsar results to your web searches.

item.title: Dubsar on Coral CDN
item.description: Dubsar is trying out the Coral CDN. Please report any problems to dubsar@dubsar-dictionary.com.

item.title: Dubsar Release 1.0.2
item.description: Release 1.0.2 of Dubsar is available. This release provides a number of bug fixes, adds some missing content and integrates with social networks.

item.title: The Lost Sentences
item.description: Some sample verb sentences from WordNet® were accidentally left out of Dubsar. They've now been included. Look for them in the tooltips.

item.title: Dubsar Mobile Edition
item.description: Look for a mobile edition of Dubsar in 2011. In preparation for the project, the Dubsar team has to procure a better mobile device, but he's not allowed to buy himself anything till after Christmas. Happy Holidays!

item.title: RSS News Feed
item.description: Dubsar now has its own RSS news feed, making it easy to subscribe to these notifications.

item.title: Social Links
item.description: Dubsar now sports a number of social links near the top of the page, making it easy to share. Dubsar has also taken up residence on Facebook.

item.title: Link to Dubsar
item.description: Now it's easy to link to Dubsar from your website.

item.title: WordNet® Content
item.description: The entire content of WordNet® is now available in the application.

item.title: Initial Launch
item.description: Dubsar was officially launched November 14, 2010.
